docs.text: Dorrestein Lab Website ¶ Research Aims ¶ Develop new mass spectrometry tools including bioinformatics tools Understand Chemistry within microbes and how it impacts the ecosystem Develop mass spectrometry approaches to visualize metabolic exchange in a spatial and system-wide manner Develop mass spectrometry approaches to structurally characterize molecules involved in metabolic exchange and monitor their dynamics Find innovative ways of community engagement in data analysis
